title: webdav fails due to ‘base uri’ issues with oc 4.5.x, apache, php-fpm, proxy_fcgi
body:
on one of my machines, i run apache 2.4.3 with php 5.4.9 fpm. apache accesses php-fpm through mod_proxy_fcgi.

when i try to connect to owncloud via webdav, i get this error:
```
this xml file does not appear to have any style information associated with it. the document tree is shown below.
<d:error xmlns:d="dav:" xmlns:s="http://sabredav.org/ns">
<s:exception>sabre_dav_exception_forbidden</s:exception>
<s:message>
requested uri (/remote.php/webdav/) is out of base uri (/remote/remote.php/webdav/)
</s:message>
<s:sabredav-version>1.6.4</s:sabredav-version>
</d:error>
````

on the same machine, when i use the classic mod_php, webdav works fine.

my apache configuration for php-fpm is typical and works with other applications (or owncloud's web frontend).

virtual host configuration:
```
<ifdefine default_vhost>
<virtualhost *:80>
  servername owncloud.mydomain.tld
  documentroot /home/www/oc/public
  directoryindex index.html index.htm index.php index.php4 index.php5
  <directory  /home/www/oc/public>
    require all granted
    options -indexes +symlinksifownermatch
    allowoverride all
  </directory>

  proxypassmatch ^/(.*\.php(/.*)?)$ fcgi://127.0.0.1:10101/home/www/oc/public/$1

  errorlog /var/log/apache2/oc_error_log
  customlog /var/log/apache2/oc_access_log combined
</virtualhost>
</ifdefine>
```
php-fpm pool configuration:
```
[owncloud]
listen = 127.0.0.1:10101
listen.allowed_clients = 127.0.0.1
user = oc
group = oc
pm = dynamic
pm.max_children = 60
pm.start_servers = 3
pm.min_spare_servers = 3
pm.max_spare_servers = 6
```

any help will be appreciated.
